{"games":[{"creatorId":3959677,"creatorName":"BIG Games Simulators","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2075028,"totalDownVotes":125849,"universeId":2316994223,"name":"[❤️ Axolotls!] Pet Simulator X!","placeId":6284583030,"playerCount":489493,"imageToken":"T_6284583030_936f","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👍 NEXT BIG CODE AT 2.5MM LIKES! ❤️💙
Use code "404roblox" for x8 Triple Coins Boosts! (Thanks for 2MM 💝!)

Pet Simulator X is the latest and greatest game in the Pet Simulator Series with tons of new features, worlds to explore, and hundreds of super cool pets!

💰 Collect coins to buy hundreds of eggs!
🥚 Hatch LEGENDARY pets like a Dragon or Unicorn!
🗺️ Unlock new worlds like the floating islands!
✔️ Collect and trade pets with other players!
✨ ENCHANT and UPGRADE pets or fuse them together!
😎 Collect HUNDREDS of unique pets!

🎁 Latest Update [2/12/22]
- ❤️ Axolotls!
- 🌊 Ocean World!
- 🥚 Axolotl Eggs!
- ❔ The Void
- 🌀 Hacker Portal!

- ✨ New Exclusive Egg!
+ TONS MORE!


🧡 Made with love by Preston

🔔 Follow for game updates! 🔔","genre":""},{"creatorId":60596019,"creatorName":"Wolfpaq","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2598461,"totalDownVotes":392672,"universeId":1686885941,"name":"Brookhaven 🏡RP","placeId":4924922222,"playerCount":554144,"imageToken":"T_4924922222_4cda","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A place to hang out with like minded people and roleplay.  Own and live in amazing houses, drive cool vehicles and explore the city. Be whoever you want to be in Brookhaven RP.

Thanks for playing!
Wanted to thank Roblox staff for fixing the publishing issue.

Private Server Controls: To open private server controls you must be owner of a server and click the grey button on top left of screen.

","genre":""},{"creatorId":4372130,"creatorName":"Gamer Robot | youtube.com/GamerRobot","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1427304,"totalDownVotes":95201,"universeId":994732206,"name":"[☀️☁️ UPDATE 17] Blox Fruits","placeId":2753915549,"playerCount":171065,"imageToken":"T_2753915549_8271","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"☀️☁️ UPDATE 17 Part 1 /  UPDATE OUT NOW 
New Fruit, New awakening, new island, new weapon, and MORE! Part 2 soon!

Welcome to Blox Fruits! Become a master swordsman or a powerful blox fruit user as you train to become the strongest player to ever live. You can choose to fight against tough enemies or have powerful boss battles while sailing across the ocean to find hidden secrets. 

Current level cap: 2200
Current fruits in the game:
Bomb, Spike, Chop, Spring, Kilo, Smoke, Spin, Flame, Falcon, Ice, Sand, Dark, Revive, Diamond, Light, Love, Magma, Door, Rubber, Quake, Human Buddha, Barrier, String, Bird Phoenix, Rumble, Paw, Gravity, Dough, Shadow, Venom, Control, Dragon, and SOUL FRUIT

FAQ:
- Fruits spawn in the map every hour / despawn after 20. 
- You can buy fruits from the Blox Fruits Dealer. He restocks random fruits every 4 hours 
- More info in the group description

Do not exploit or auto farm, our auto-detection will catch you and we do not appeal our bans.","genre":""},{"creatorId":9213039,"creatorName":"Sulley","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":760282,"totalDownVotes":52112,"universeId":2324662457,"name":"[UPD 20 + 2x💥💰] Anime Fighters Simulator","placeId":6299805723,"playerCount":77597,"imageToken":"T_6299805723_c6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Anime Fighters!
📢New code at 800k Likes!
Thanks for 700k likes! Use codes "700klikes"

🗺️ Explore, and be the first to discover a secret fighter!
👊 Collect and train the strongest fighters!
🌲 Discover new worlds, with new fighters in each one!
✨ The possibilities are endless!

🎁 Latest Update:
- New Island: Icy Wastes
- 13 New Fighters!
- Meteor showers happen randomly!
- New Metal Star in Alchemy Island!
- New Talent system for all fighters!
- Check talents with the Appraiser in Fruits Island!
- Buffed drops in all worlds!
- Bug fixes + balance changes + improvements","genre":""},{"creatorId":295182,"creatorName":"DreamCraft","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":5355737,"totalDownVotes":1041489,"universeId":383310974,"name":"Adopt Me!","placeId":920587237,"playerCount":199229,"imageToken":"T_920587237_6b7b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🏮 Happy Lunar New Year! 🏮

Raise and dress cute pets, decorate your house, and play with friends in the magical, family-friendly world of Adopt Me! on Roblox! 🐶🏘️😻

Terms of Service, Privacy Policy and Creative Attributions: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/credits/71812","genre":""},{"creatorId":1912490,"creatorName":"Onett","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":1535166,"totalDownVotes":84635,"universeId":601130232,"name":"Bee Swarm Simulator","placeId":1537690962,"playerCount":50764,"imageToken":"T_1537690962_a8c9","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🎁 x2 Event: Join for 48 hours of x2 Pollen and Convert Rate to celebrate the new year. Complete quests for Bee Bear, Winter quests for all the NPCs, meet Dapper Bear and his Planter Pots and more.

Grow your own swarm of bees, collect pollen, and make honey in Bee Swarm Simulator! Meet friendly bears, complete their quests and get rewards! As your hive grows larger and larger, you can explore further up the mountain. Use your bees to defeat dangerous bugs and monsters. Look for treasures hidden around the map. Discover new types of bees, all with their own traits and personalities!

Join Bee Swarm Simulator Club for Honey, Treats and codes! https://www.roblox.com/groups/3982592","genre":""},{"creatorId":1226491,"creatorName":"RELL World","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1438840,"totalDownVotes":92706,"universeId":1511883870,"name":"[UPDATE] Shindo Life","placeId":4616652839,"playerCount":56975,"imageToken":"T_4616652839_4a58","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔑 Welcome to Shindo Life
🔷 Explore vast worlds, play many game modes, and mini-games. Battle various types of creatures known as spirits. Unlock and randomize many abilities, and awakens. Battle bosses for their unique Bloodlines and Abilities. Rank up and further your skill under mentors. Your Shindo adventure awaits!

🔑 Join for 2XP:
🔷 https://www.roblox.com/groups/1226491/RW","genre":""},{"creatorId":5774246,"creatorName":"Easy.gg","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":924277,"totalDownVotes":191021,"universeId":2619619496,"name":"BedWars ✨ [LUCKY BLOCK v3!]","placeId":6872265039,"playerCount":89268,"imageToken":"T_6872265039_aa21","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🔥🔥🔥 UPDATE TIME: Friday 3:00pm PST 🔥🔥🔥

Controls:
[Shift]: Sprint
[E]: Open Inventory
[Q]: Drop item
[Ctrl]: Lock camera
[T]: Use Emote

How to play BedWars:
📡 Join the "BedWars" queue in the Lobby to find a game
🛌 Protect your base. Once it's gone, you can no longer respawn!
💎 Gather resources to purchase items and team upgrades
🏹 Destroy enemy beds and eliminate players to win the game!

✨ Play custom modes like SkyWars and Lucky Block!

💖 Easy Games","genre":""},{"creatorId":29622,"creatorName":"callmehbob","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2573214,"totalDownVotes":332956,"universeId":321778215,"name":"Royale🏰High","placeId":735030788,"playerCount":73913,"imageToken":"T_735030788_21f6","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"♡Happy Valentines, Black History Month, and Lunar New Year!♡
✧~❄~✧~❄~✧

Welcome to Royale High, your ever-growing dream world!
✧~♡~✧
♡Use your Teleportation Sceptre to fast-travel across magical lands, with secrets to explore & fun games to play!
♡Games earn you the valuable currency 💎Diamonds, increases your level, & challenges your knowledge and skills!
♡Spend your diamonds in the shop, which sells special items during real-life seasons.
♡Dress your character to suit your mood & personality~ free makeup, hairstyles, & thousands of unique outfits for any occasion!
♡Level up at Royale High School by attending classes! The higher grades you receive, the more rewards you earn!
♡Make sure to bring the right book to class from your locker, and turn in your completed homework!
♡Try to balance your studies and socializing, as many best friends have been made within these halls♡","genre":""},{"creatorId":1848960,"creatorName":"Nikilis","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":4912408,"totalDownVotes":421093,"universeId":66654135,"name":"Murder Mystery 2","placeId":142823291,"playerCount":75913,"imageToken":"T_142823291_8b7a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you solve the Mystery and survive each round?

INNOCENTS: Run and hide from the Murderer. Use your detective skills to expose the Murderer.
SHERIFF: Work with the Innocents; you are the only one with a weapon who can take down the Murderer. 
MURDERER: Eliminate EVERYONE. Don't get shot by the sheriff.

Collect and trade hundreds of knives! 

Check out my profile for quick links to my pages! 
Like, follow, and subscribe for exclusive update news, free knife codes, and more!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5292947,"creatorName":"Top Down Games","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":923017,"totalDownVotes":72684,"universeId":1720936166,"name":"[WORLD 2] All Star Tower Defense","placeId":4996049426,"playerCount":57523,"imageToken":"T_4996049426_1b09","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️Use your units to fend off waves of enemies

Collect them all!

📝Join the Social Links to Gain Codes/Announcement/Updates
❤️Like the Game for More Codes!

🔨More updates upcoming!","genre":""},{"creatorId":63700903,"creatorName":"Coeptus","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":3928800,"totalDownVotes":414429,"universeId":88070565,"name":"Welcome to Bloxburg","placeId":185655149,"playerCount":73625,"imageToken":"T_185655149_9e67","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":25,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build and design your own amazing house, own cool vehicles, hang out with friends, work, roleplay or explore the city of Bloxburg. The possibilities are endless!

Version: 0.10.4
Update Log: https://devforum.roblox.com/t/--/361910","genre":""},{"creatorId":2782840,"creatorName":"Chillz Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":1966140,"totalDownVotes":152519,"universeId":210851291,"name":"Build A Boat For Treasure","placeId":537413528,"playerCount":54260,"imageToken":"T_537413528_d6fc","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Build your ship and set sail for your adventure!

--- 300% more health!
--- 25% more gold!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4546767,"creatorName":"Pressure Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":116744,"totalDownVotes":5423,"universeId":2937673012,"name":"[UPD6] ⚡Clicker Simulator!⚡","placeId":7560156054,"playerCount":53203,"imageToken":"T_7560156054_e0eb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"👍 NEW CODE AT 125K LIKES!

🔔 UPDATE 6 🔔
⚗️ NEW CHEMICAL ISLAND!
🥚 NEW CHEMICAL EGG WITH 9 NEW PETS!
❓ NEW SECRET PET IN CHEMICAL EGG!
🐸 NEW REBIRTH & CRAFTED PETS!

☘️ NEW CODE: 75KLIKES & 100KLIKES
🐛 Other fixes & improvements!

☑️ Roblox Premium members can equip 1 extra pet!
💨 Double-tap your jump button to Double Jump! (PC = Spacebar, Mobile = Jump Button)

HOW TO PLAY:

🐾 Hatch, collect, and trade LEGENDARY pets!

💰 Buy rebirth pets & buttons to help you on your journey!
⏫ Unlock more Double Jumps & discover Islands high above!
🏆 Climb the leaderboards & become a Clicking God!

🔔 Updates every week! FOLLOW & FAVORITE to be notified!","genre":""},{"creatorId":3194064,"creatorName":"Bizarre Studios®","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":835378,"totalDownVotes":91011,"universeId":1016936714,"name":"Your Bizarre Adventure ","placeId":2809202155,"playerCount":23102,"imageToken":"T_2809202155_cd90","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"✨🏹『NEW UPDATE v0.9』 🏹✨
➢ New trading system; Trade Stands! Trade Items! and multiple other QoL features
➢ 7 new Stand skins!
➢ 4 new Cosmetics!
➢ and more in game!

Welcome to Your Bizarre Adventure, an RPG-styled game that revolves around obtaining strong and unique spiritual abilities known as "STANDS", fighting gangs, and more! Read the help section in-game! JOIN OUR COMMUNITY'S SERVER LINK BELOW FOR CODES, UPDATES, ANNOUNCEMENTS, AND MORE HELP!

Give the game page a thumbs-up like and subscribe to our Youtube below for more codes:
➢ youtube.com/channel/UCwxB9DjiJKOcZbDPIvsCZBg?sub_confirmation=1

Disclaimers:
➢ You will be banned for any form of exploiting and there will be no appeals unless you have high quality video evidence that shows it was you getting falsely banned as it happened. It is highly suggested to use the applications "Medal" or "Shadowplay" to achieve this for your own safety.

Arrivederci!","genre":""},{"creatorId":4294803,"creatorName":"Fireheart Studio","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":381300,"totalDownVotes":57277,"universeId":1650291138,"name":"Demonfall [2.9!]","placeId":4855457388,"playerCount":23791,"imageToken":"T_4855457388_e0ab","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Demonfall is based on the popular series Demon Slayer.

Ascend the hill with the power of humanity on your shoulder, and fight for survival along with your comrades; or head down the ravine to lose ones humanity, and live as a demon with unholy powers.
Fight, explore, learn, grow, eat, all common necessities and virtues of one, despite your path, in this world, its the survival of the fittest.

[Controls]
R - Unsheathe Sword
Tab - Menu Toggle Tab --> Configuration = Reset
M - Meditate [Skill Tree]
H - Toggle Emotes
Sprint + M1 - Lunge
Block + M1 - Shoulder Bash
C - Rush
G - Breathe
Q - Dash
F - Block","genre":""},{"creatorId":3059674,"creatorName":"Badimo","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":4809108,"totalDownVotes":649017,"universeId":245662005,"name":"Jailbreak","placeId":606849621,"playerCount":29454,"imageToken":"T_606849621_25a8","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"🏁 The OFFICIAL McLaren F1 Event has begun! Drive the new MCL36 for FREE for a limited time, or buy the car to keep it FOREVER! 
🏁 And race on our new limited time race track with friends! Best in VIP servers!

February already! Our newest update is here!
🚀 - Season 8 has begun! With FUTURISTIC prizes including...
🤖 - The CELSIOR! Hover around in style. Free at Level 10!
🔥 - New GARAGE! With Favorites, Sorting, Grid view, and much more!
💰 - New Vehicle: The Badger! Find it at the Museum for 45k Cash!
☀️ - New Spring Map! Enjoy more colors than ever.



🏆 Jailbreak is an award-winning game played over five billion times where you can orchestrate a robbery or stop the criminals before they get away! Team up with friends for even more fun and plan the ultimate raid or heist. What role will you play? 

🖥 Programmed by Badcc. @badccvoid
🎨 Designed by asimo3089.  @asimo3089","genre":""},{"creatorId":4698921,"creatorName":"Da Hood Entertainment","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":619218,"totalDownVotes":286527,"universeId":1008451066,"name":"Da Hood","placeId":2788229376,"playerCount":26129,"imageToken":"T_2788229376_aeaa","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"A difficult game, read below for tips.
Account has to be at least 10 days to play.

[PC/XBOX Controls][F/ButtonY - Block][E/PadDown - Stomp][G/PadUp - Carry][LCTRL+ButtonB - Crouch]
Crouch+Carry = Ragdoll thrown.
You can weave 100% if you time at the right time when blocking.

To gain muscle buy weights at fitness.
Eat lettuce to reduce muscle.

Cop: To join cops go to the police station, if you execute anyone without cuffs you'll be automatically kicked off. Use cuffs instead.

Criminals: Ransack banks and several others small time shops in order to gain wanted or cash.

Gun saves - however, can be lost by death, or logging when KO, or 0 ammo.

cash drop takes 30%

Game-Commands: "/e stats"","genre":""},{"creatorId":22718068,"creatorName":"uglyburger0","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":614999,"totalDownVotes":51374,"universeId":1000233041,"name":"3008 [2.7]","placeId":2768379856,"playerCount":53097,"imageToken":"T_2768379856_127a","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Version 2.7
Don't follow any links put in-game. They will scam you!

Thumbnail by: @Plague_Dash
--
SCP-3008, the infinite IKEA. Wander through the vast horror land of furniture located within SCP-3008-1. Build a base, survive from employees. Stay alive.","genre":""},{"creatorId":2613928,"creatorName":"ROLVe Community","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":3718305,"totalDownVotes":465259,"universeId":111958650,"name":"Arsenal","placeId":286090429,"playerCount":19852,"imageToken":"T_286090429_76fe","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Race to the top through a massive Arsenal of weapons! 

Conquer the day in fast paced arcade gameplay, from bazookas to spell books, each weapon will keep you guessing on what's next! 

Earn BattleBucks and trick out your game with a huge cast of characters, melees, kill effects, skins and more!

Join the ROLVe Community group for an in-game chat tag and 25% more BattleBucks and XP!","genre":""},{"creatorId":359752057,"creatorName":"SamirDevs","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":26679,"totalDownVotes":2203,"universeId":3006998275,"name":"[🎉UPDATE🎉] Sword Factory","placeId":7755155116,"playerCount":13555,"imageToken":"T_7755155116_3e96","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"⚔️ Welcome to Sword Factory! ⚔️

🔗 Join the roblox group SamirDevs Studios in the description below to get a +25% luck boost in both ascender and factory!

📚 This is a tycoon and simulator based game about creating swords with your factory and gaining cash from selling them or fighting mobs using your own swords!

🎮 Gameplay:
- You create swords with your own factory!
- Upgrade parts of your factory for better swords!
- Battle noobs with your swords for EXP and Levels!
- Compete in many leaderboards!

📙 Update Log [v5.23]:
- x3 Weekend Event is now active!
- Fixed a major duping method issue in the game.
- Increased the luck balancing but decreased event.
- Fixed the luck events being completely broken.
- Changed the rarity text on items to addition.
- Added exploiter logs to the communication server.
- Added new admins to the game.
- Full update log in the community server.

🏅 Credits:
SamirDevs - Developer
Ozzour - Map Builder
NikoSquared - Game Idea","genre":""},{"creatorId":4217910,"creatorName":"YXCeptional Studios","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":2923962,"totalDownVotes":870437,"universeId":703124385,"name":"Tower of Hell","placeId":1962086868,"playerCount":59021,"imageToken":"T_1962086868_5fcb","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Can you be the first to the top in this randomly generated obby with absolutely no checkpoints at all?



Owners of VIP-Servers can use the settings menu to skip rounds, set the tower size and lock the shop.

For support go to support.yx.zone","genre":""},{"creatorId":5212858,"creatorName":"Vows by the Sea","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":101386,"totalDownVotes":10519,"universeId":1359573625,"name":"Deepwoken","placeId":4111023553,"playerCount":10958,"imageToken":"T_4111023553_ec2b","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":400,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":">> Deepwoken is a difficult game with permanent character loss. Losing characters is a part of the game that should be expected. <<

Seek out your destiny upon an unforgiving sea and unravel the mysteries of a dying world. Discover and modify powerful abilities, find unique strengths, and develop your character into a force to be reckoned with. Desperately try to escape the horrors that lurk just beneath the waves. Whatever you do, it's your story to be told.

Developed by: Ragoozer, Arch_Mage, Melon_Sensei, Dexerius, Grimmkind
Built by: Zartania, melonbeard
Composed by: Naktigonis
Contributions from: Snakeworl (Scripting), yayafino (Scripting), iVenatrix (Scripting), EstheKing (Modelling), HorrorTM (Modelling), minkle (Modelling), Konrekhelm (Modelling), Zintenka (Modelling), Chicken_Man (Ships), KAHAEL (Clothing), Rengi (Clothing)

The full list of contributors is listed in the Credits screen, check out their work!","genre":""},{"creatorId":5348890,"creatorName":"Thai Piece","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":629507,"totalDownVotes":58983,"universeId":1451439645,"name":"[Update 3 ❄️]King Legacy","placeId":4520749081,"playerCount":30063,"imageToken":"T_4520749081_db05","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Join Dis for more code

Cr Clothing: Blotnik","genre":""},{"creatorId":13270425,"creatorName":"Just Games..","creatorType":"Group","totalUpVotes":62211,"totalDownVotes":5592,"universeId":3199002329,"name":"[⚡x2] Anime Punching Simulator","placeId":8357510970,"playerCount":23360,"imageToken":"T_8357510970_6d61","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"Welcome to Anime Punching Simulator!

","genre":""},{"creatorId":123247,"creatorName":"alexnewtron","creatorType":"User","totalUpVotes":2568225,"totalDownVotes":366496,"universeId":140239261,"name":"❄️ MeepCity ❄️","placeId":370731277,"playerCount":50933,"imageToken":"T_370731277_ebb7","isSponsored":false,"nativeAdData":"","isShowSponsoredLabel":false,"price":null,"analyticsIdentifier":null,"gameDescription":"💙💙 The game that is Powering Imagination! Chat, play games, earn coins, and customize your very own estate! Play with millions of players who play MeepCity! 💙💙
